effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If the target is already weakened, they are also bleeding (save ends).

items.name: Crag Burst
items.target: Each enemy and object in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The area is difficult terrain. Whenever a creature enters square in the area, they take 3 damage.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The granite stone giant moves up to their speed and creates a 14 wall of stone in squares adjacent to the path of their movement.

items.name: Pillar
items.trigger: A creature or object within distance moves or shifts away from the granite stone giant.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A 1-square pillar of stone rises 5 squares out of the ground beneath the target, who moves with the ground to its new elevation, then is vertical pushed 5 squares.
Whenever an enemy obtains a tier 1 outcome on a melee ability used against the granite stone giant, they take a bane on that ability until the end of the encounter.
The granite stone giant ignores difficult terrain.
The granite stone giant can burrow through stone, but can't drag other creatures underground when they do so.
